data.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down. It’s whether you get up.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: It’s not about perfect. It’s about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that’s where transformation happens. That’s how change occurs.
data.author: Jillian Michaels

data.quote: Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.
data.author: Rikki Rogers

data.quote: We don’t develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
data.author: Barbara De Angelis

data.quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: You don’t drown by falling in the water; you drown by staying there.
data.author: Ed Cole

data.quote: I'm not telling you it's going to be easy - I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
data.author: Art Williams

data.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: If we all did the things we are capable of doing we would literally astound ourselves.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
data.author: Lou Holtz

data.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
data.author: Ralph Emerson

data.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
data.author: Edmund Hillary

data.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.
data.author: Dolly Parton

data.quote: Have faith in yourself and in the future.
data.author: Ted Kennedy

data.quote: It’s kind of fun to do the impossible.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Find your purpose and fling your life out to it. Find a way or make one. Try with all your might. Self-made or never made.
data.author: Orison Swett Marden

data.quote: Most obstacles melt away when we make up our minds to walk boldly through them.
data.author: Orison Swett Marden
